title: 37. Can Fear Be Good Medicine?
description: Fear is a popular tool in public health campaigns. But is it an effective one? Bapu Jena discusses new research on whether we can — and should — scare people into being healthier.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
